name: AI Assistance
description:
Made for the Wowie Jam 4.0, as my first game jam, and first Itch game.

In AI Assistance, you must use the enemy robots to aid you in reaching the finish. Having hacked into their AI, you can now control when they jump. Collect shields and use the enemy AI to reach the finish.

Controls: (AZERTY keyboards are supported too, select the option in the options menu -- See keys in brackets for AZERTY keyboard controls below)

Movement: Left and Right Arrow Keys or A and D (Q and D)

Jump: Up Arrow Key, W (Z)

AI Jump: Spacebar

Quit button does work, just not in the web version :)

(Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com)
